channel.title: Ports on Machine Learning
channel.description: Recent content in Ports on Machine Learning

item.title: Find and Kill a Process
item.description: see also: 鸟哥 Linux 私房菜 Basic Linux. Linux # find bound PID by port: fuser 8080/tcp kill by port: fuser -k 8080/tcp list by port: lsof -i:8080 using netstat: netstat -nlpte |grep :8080 or: ss -nlpt 'sport = :8080' ref 1 & ref 2 Windows # CMD find & kill by PID: netstat -ano | findstr :8080 tasklist | findstr "<the_PID>" taskkill /PID <the_PID> /F PS find for TCP & UDP:
